alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 3:39AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 16 inches...heaviest in the Huron Mountains and in the higher terrain southwest, west and northwest of Marquette. The heavy snow will spread north across Marquette County between 8 AM and 11 AM EST. Snowfall rates of at least 1 inch per hour will likely occur for several hours once it begins. * WHERE...Marquette County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
